description:
Konoha Akisato is an illustrator that loves beautiful girls and bishojo games. Her dream is to become a super-popular illustrator, so she is working hard at a bishojo game production company, but reality isn't that kind... With the golden age of social network games in full force, Konoha's company isn't doing well, and she works as a sub illustrator, spending her days painting the backs of random background characters.

One day, the owner of a game shop gives her a classic bishojo game. With all her excitement over the golden age of bishojo games, she opens the package to "Dokyusei," and is enveloped by a bright light. Konoha then realizes that she just traveled back in time!

She ends up in the year 1992! It's the dawn of the bishojo game era! Konoha ends up working at a company called Alcohol Soft. Will she be able to think about, draw, and create all the beautiful girls she’s ever wanted?!

A story about a girl and her overwhelming love for beautiful girls—"Now, let's begin!"

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Video Games
tags.description: Centers around characters playing video games.

tags.name: Software Development
tags.description: Centers around characters developing or programming a piece of technology, software, gaming, etc.

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

tags.name: Otaku Culture
tags.description: Centers around the culture of a fanatical fan-base.

tags.name: Work
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

tags.name: Drawing
tags.description: Centers around the art of drawing, including manga and doujinshi.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Historical
tags.description: Partly or completely set during a real period of world history.

tags.name: Anachronism
tags.description: Prominently features elements that are out of place in the historical period the work takes place in, particularly modern elements in a historical setting.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Dystopian
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a society characterized by poverty, squalor or oppression.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Age Gap
tags.description: Prominently features romantic relations between people with a significant age difference.

Website | Blog | Portfolio | Anison __Kouta Kobayashi__, commonly known as Yashikin, is a Japanese lyricist, composer and orechestrator. He was born in Toshima-ku, Tokyo, Japan, and brought up in Ikebukuro. He is affiliated with F.M.F.

__Birth Name:__ Nakagawa (中川) Shiyōko (しようこ)
__Birth Place:__ Nakano, Tokyo, Japan 
__Nickname:__ Shokotan (しょこたん), Shokotasu (ショコタス)  
__Height:__ 156cm  
__BWH:__ 84 - 58 - 84 cm

[Official Website](http://www.nakagawashoko.com/) | [Other Website]( http://shokoland.excite.co.jp/) | [Blog](http://ameblo.jp/nakagawa-shoko/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/shoko55mmts/) | [Sony Music Profile](http://www.sonymusic.co.jp/Music/Arch/SR/ShokoNakagawa/) | [Watanabe Entertainment Profile](http://www.watanabepro.co.jp/mypage/artist/nakagawashoko.html)

She is a Japanese idol, tarento, actress, seiyū (voice actor), illustrator and singer. She is the daughter of [Katsuhiko Nakagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/265314), a celebrity in Japan in the 1980s.

Affiliated with [Studio Silver](https://anilist.co/studio/6240/). Originally from Anime Roman together with [Kou Yoshinari](https://anilist.co/staff/102136/), [Shingo Suzuki](https://anilist.co/staff/105132/) and [Hiroshi Ookubo](https://anilist.co/staff/105135/).

[Blog](http://blog.wakakitamiki.coolblog.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/angelfrench)

He was the assistant of [Takemura Yuuji](https://anilist.co/staff/105722/Yuuji-Takemura). [Satou Satsuki](https://anilist.co/staff/123240/Satsuki-Satou) and [Nakanishi Hiroshi](https://anilist.co/staff/275475/Hiroshi-Nakanishi) were his assistants.

Former adult game scenario writer. He is a creator of cult classic Shizuku, Kizuato and To Heart.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/t_takahasi)

[Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ludwig_van_Beethoven)

Ludwig van Beethoven was a German composer and pianist.

Beethoven remains one of the most admired composers in the history of Western music; his works rank amongst the most performed of the classical music repertoire. His works span the transition from the classical period to the romantic era in classical music. His career has conventionally been divided into early, middle, and late periods. The "early" period, during which he forged his craft, is typically considered to have lasted until 1802. From 1802 to around 1812, his "middle" period showed an individual development from the "classical" styles of Joseph Haydn and Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, and is sometimes characterized as "heroic." During this time, he began to suffer increasingly from deafness. In his "late" period from 1812 to his death in 1827, he extended his innovations in musical form and expression.

(Source: Wikipedia)

[Official Website](https://kotoko.asia) | [Spotify ](https://open.spotify.com/artist/06F1MiFx0dHLHEPQBIrcr9?autoplay=true) | [Blog](http://ameblo.jp/kotoko-kirakira/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/KOTOKO_Dwarf) | [Warner Home Video](http://whv-amusic.com/kotoko/) | [NBC Universal Japan](http://nbcuni-music.com/kotoko/) | [YouTube ](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYZ9uuJYYP5PX8YvpIHbEwQ)

KOTOKO is a Japanese J-pop musician, singer and songwriter. She began her singing career as a member of [I've Sound ](https://anilist.co/staff/106951/Ive) in 2000, and was later signed to Rondorobe under Geneon from 2004 to 2010. Kotoko left Geneon in 2010, left I've Sound and signed to Warner Home Video in 2011. She composes and writes lyrics (for herself as well as other singers in I've Sound) for numerous other song collections. She has contributed songs to numerous anime and video games.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/824_aoi) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/koga_aoi0824/) | [Agency Profile](https://www.81produce.co.jp/actor_search/index.php/item?id=199) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/古賀葵)

Aoi Koga is a Japanese voice actress affiliated with 81 Produce.

Koga had an interest in anime since her childhood, watching series such as Cardcaptor Sakura and Ojamajo Doremi. She first became interested in voice acting after watching the television program Okaasan to Issho and becoming fond of the puppet segments featured in the show. This made her want to "become friends with dolls" and, along with her interest in anime, helped her decide to pursue a career in entertainment. In pursuit of becoming a voice actress, Koga would take acting lessons at a vocational school in Fukuoka. Following this, she enrolled in the training school of the agency 81 Produce, becoming affiliated with them upon her finishing her training.

__Awards:__
• Best Lead Actress at the 14th Seiyuu Awards in 2020 for her role as [Kaguya Shinomiya](https://anilist.co/character/120649/).

Non-Anime Roles:
~!
• [Paimon](https://anilist.co/character/203317/Paimon) - Genshin Impact (VG)
• [Kriemhild](https://anilist.co/character/343255/Kriemhild) - Fate/Grand Order (VG)
• [Rozaliya Olenyeva](https://anilist.co/character/207926/Rozaliya-Olenyeva) - Honkai Impact 3rd (VG)
• Ivy - Memento Mori (VG)
• [Kunimi Tama](https://anilist.co/character/321902/Tama-Kunimi) - Heaven Burns Red (VG)!~
